messages.messageBody:
The link has been there since Friday night and I'm not sure why you're
having a problem. Maybe you need to refresh the screen? Click on it
again and click refresh in your browser and see if that helps. If not,
let me know.

Here's the link:
http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html

Joanne
